pages.text: Storages can store items in compact spaces. What nonsense allows this? We think magic, or math. In any case, cardboard boxes, coolers, shelves and more can store items just like a regular chest.
Some storages can be locked with a key item. It allows a little bit of security from other players. Note that any key can open a key-lockable block.
As a strange rule, most decorations if not all are unmoveable. This means they cannot be transferred to other locations like shulker boxes can.
